description: Number of elements of GF(2^n) with trace 1 and subtrace 0.
links: F. Ruskey, Number of irreducible polynomials over GF(2) with given trace and subtrace
F. Ruskey, Number of elements of GF(2^n) of given trace and subtrace
formula: C(n, r+0)+C(n, r+4)+C(n, r+8)+... where r = 1 if n odd, r = 3 if n even.a(n)=2a(n-2)+4a(n-3), n > 3. Related to A134654 by a(n)+b(n)=A131577. - _Paul Curtz_, Feb 06 2008
author: _Frank Ruskey_
